posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed McCollum
Here is the list of cards I know of that different board members have a copy of with a Howe McCormick stamp on the back. I would like to be able to find replacements for their collections so that I can get their copy into my collection. I know I wouldn't be able to get all of these at the current time, maybe even none of them...but if you have one and are interested in selling, or if you run across one in the future, please let me know. Thanks.

Abbaticchio/blue sleeves–Piedmont 350/460
Abbott–Piedmont 350
Ames/portrait–Piedmont 150
Barbeau–Piedmont 350 
Beaumont–Piedmont 150
Bender/no trees–Old Mill
Berger–Piedmont 350
Fritz–Piedmont 350
Jennings/portrait–Piedmont 150
Killian/pitching–Hindu
Lundgren/Chicago–Piedmont 150
Mullaney–Hindu
Stahl/no glove shows–Piedmont 150
Wallace–Piedmont 150

Posted By: Dave S
Ed I have the blue Abbaticchio Pied350-460.  GAI 3, LMK if interested...
kubbman23@hotmail.com

Posted By: Ryan W
I have an Abbott with a Sweet Caporal 350 back, not sure if you would be interested.
